code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deleteEntry=function deleteEntry(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deleteEntry:deleteEntry};
